f5f24fea-4315-4cec-86a2-3de617138c25.content:
To create a customer master in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, you can follow these steps: 
1. Go to the Business Partners app and select Customers.
2. Click on the New button to create a new customer.
3. Enter the required information for the customer, such as name, address, contact details, etc.
4. Save the customer record. 
You can also use the Implementation Guide (IMG) tool to adjust the system to your requirements and configure customer master settings.

b106bf46-a167-4840-95b8-87146caeb636.content: Forecast 2.0 is a transient store designed to improve user experience and response times for Project Managers. It is not the system of record for planning and forecasting, but rather a source that leverages data already flowing into it to avoid new development efforts from SAP. Any discrepancies are mitigated through a reconciliation process in SAP, and financial calculations working today in SAP production continue to remain as-is. Variance in forecast values can be expected due to Forecast 2.0 not sourcing or using all the data from SAP, which remains the actual system of record.
